defined_rules:
Only take trades near the VWAP and stick to only VWAP Breakouts
Take PML Breakouts with 0 Risk, so (Breakeven stop loss right at entry)
Save yourself and your mental energy
Do not trade anything else (Trade your setup, not the emotion)
If you have a loss, please do not lose it and take a trade right away (It has NEVER gone into your favour) Look at the reference (out of box) to take another trade if you want to
The first partial should be around 1.5R from now on to make it worth it. Make it 60% of your position
No low price stocks (Anything less than $80)

items.title: Take Partials @1.5R
items.detail: Go for at least 60% of the position

items.title: VWAP Breakouts
items.detail: Only taking a trade near VWAP

items.title: PML Breakouts
items.detail: Only in the first 3 Minutes, preferably at 9.32
